name: Chapter 8: The Predator
short_description: While navigating the river, the group is attacked by a large predatory fish. They use their wits and teamwork to escape, but the experience leaves them on edge.
events: Predatory attack, strategic escape, heightened caution.
people: Bubbles, Finley, Lola, Guppy, Predator Fish
from_prev_chapter: Successfully navigating parts of the river.
to_next_chapter: The group becomes more cautious and alert.

beats.long_title: The Group Enjoys a Moment of Calm
beats.description: After successfully navigating parts of the river, Bubbles and his friends find themselves in a stretch of calm waters. The scenery around them is beautiful, and they momentarily forget the dangers that lie ahead.
